name: Taylor In Illusion
description:
Taylor In Illusion is my entry for community game jam that happened on August 25-31, 2019. The game follows the theme of the jam, “The Game Is A Liar.”
HOW TO PLAY
Control Taylor, the main character of the game, and navigate through the illusion filled world.

CONTROLS
WASD or Arrow Keys to "MOVE"
Space to "JUMP"

TOOLS
Audacity
Bfxr
Gimp
Inkscape Studio
Kdenlive
LMMS
OBS
Unity3D Visual Studio Community
VLC
